basics.aboutMe:
Throughout my career, I have contributed my expertise to both small and large-scale projects, encompassing both Frontend and Backend development. However, my true passion and focus lie in the Frontend realm.

I greatly enjoy tackling new challenges and continuously learning. In fact, it could be said that this constant pursuit of knowledge and problem-solving is my favorite hobby.

experience.description: At Beliveo, as a software developer specialist, I develop internal tools to improve the work of collaborators and maintain a system in PHP. I work with React JS, Material UI and Apollo Client for the frontend, and Node JS, Express JS, Apollo Server GraphQL and MySQL for the backend.
activities: Finance module (expense registration, recurring purchases, budget management, budget history)
Creation of an innovative application to offer and request rides between colleagues (Authentication, user management, use of Google Directions, and more)
Modern tree view (Migration from legacy tree view)
Support for legacy tools written in PHP
Implementation of real-time notifications with WebSocket
Implementation of unit and component tests with Jest and Cypress

experience.description: At the Government of Zapopan, I worked on multiple new developments with different technologies for various departments, in addition to providing support for the city's Cadastral system. The technologies we used were: PHP, particularly with the CodeIgniter and Laravel frameworks, as well as JavaScript with jQuery and Bootstrap.
activities: Reporting and tracking system for public services to citizens with over 300,000 reports (WhatsApp bot, authentication, PDF reports, implementation of Google Maps API, and more)
Ticketing system to provide attention and support to the cadastral department, scalable system eventually used by all my colleagues in their areas.
Maintenance of the cadastral system of Zapopan
Development of a platform with Laravel for the creation and tracking of most procedures in Zapopan.
React Native application for scanning preferential parking QR codes

experience.description: As a developer at the Government of Ocotl√°n, I was responsible for developing tools for various departments, as well as projects for the citizens. The technologies we used were: PHP, CodeIgniter, JavaScript with jQuery, and Material Design.
activities: Human resources platform (personal data capture, contract generation, file uploading, and more)
Ocotl√°n Express, platform to promote local businesses
Tracking system for food package delivery during COVID times

projects.description: On the Ventanilla Digital Zapopan website, you can manage municipal procedures such as cadastre, construction licenses, civil registry, electronic invoicing, and online payments quickly and easily.
